about: Automobile Engineering is a branch of engineering that focuses on the design, development, manufacturing, and maintenance of automobiles. It integrates elements of mechanical, electrical, electronic, software, and safety engineering to create efficient and high-performance vehicles. Automobile engineers work on various aspects, including vehicle aerodynamics, powertrain systems, fuel efficiency, safety features, and advanced technologies such as electric and autonomous vehicles. With the rapid advancements in automotive technology, the field is evolving towards sustainability, incorporating hybrid and electric powertrains to reduce carbon emissions. As the demand for smart and connected vehicles increases, automobile engineering continues to drive innovation in transportation, enhancing performance, safety, and environmental impact.
vision: To become an excellent centre in terms of teaching and research for enhancing the language and communication skills of students from engineering, technology and management fields and for transforming them into responsible professionals for meeting national and global requirements.
mission: The department is committed to producing world-class graduates by enhancing their listening, speaking, reading and writing skills along with employability and life skills required for higher education, career enhancement and entrepreneurship using innovative teaching and learning methodologies.
objective: To train students to master the art of communication, develop their language skills and make them “Industry ready”, employing Outcome Based Education parameters.
To provide students with a curriculum that will help them to develop their language skills.
